intro.title: 1. Privacy at a Glance
intro.description: The following information provides a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website. Personal data is any data that can be used to personally identify you.

items.account: Account data (name, email address) during registration
items.technical: Technical data (IP address, browser type, access times)

items.service: Provision and improvement of our services
items.communication: Communication with you regarding your account

legal.title: 5. Legal Basis
legal.description: Processing is based on Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR (contract performance), Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR (consent), and Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR (legitimate interests).

cookies.title: 6. Cookies
cookies.description: We only use technically necessary cookies required for the operation of the website. These cookies store your session information and language settings.

sharing.title: 7. Data Sharing
sharing.description: Your data is not sold to third parties. Data is only shared with service providers who assist us in providing our services, and only to the extent necessary.

retention.title: 8. Data Retention
retention.description: Your data will be deleted as soon as it is no longer necessary for the purpose for which it was collected. Account data is removed when you delete your account, unless statutory retention periods apply.

rights.title: 9. Your Rights
rights.description: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

items.access: Right to access your stored data
items.rectification: Right to rectification of inaccurate data
items.erasure: Right to erasure of your data

complaint.title: 10. Right to Complain
complaint.description: You have the right to lodge a complaint with a data protection supervisory authority regarding the processing of your personal data.

changes.title: 11. Changes
changes.description: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy to reflect changes in legal requirements or changes to our services.

scope.title: 1. Scope
scope.description: These terms of service apply to the use of the Certiread platform. By registering and using our services, you accept these terms.

services.title: 2. Service Description
services.description: Certiread provides a platform for creating transparency certificates for digital content. Publishers can document how their content was created and display this through a verifiable badge on their website.

registration.title: 3. Registration and Account
registration.description: Registration is required to use our services. You agree to:

items.accurate: Provide truthful and complete information during registration
items.secure: Keep your login credentials secure and not share them with third parties
items.responsible: Be responsible for all activities under your account

obligations.title: 4. User Obligations
obligations.description: When using Certiread, you agree to:

items.lawful: Use the platform only for lawful purposes
items.truthful: Only provide truthful information in certifications
items.noAbuse: Not abuse or manipulate the platform
items.noHarm: Not certify content that violates applicable law

certifications.title: 5. Certifications
certifications.description: For created certifications, the following applies:

items.ownership: You may only certify content for which you have the necessary rights
items.accuracy: The information in the certification must be accurate
items.revocation: We reserve the right to revoke false or misleading certifications

liability.title: 6. Liability
liability.description: Certiread is not liable for the accuracy of certifications created by users. The responsibility for the correctness of the information lies with the respective user. Our liability is limited to intent and gross negligence.

termination.title: 7. Termination
termination.description: You can delete your account at any time. We reserve the right to suspend or delete accounts in case of violations of these terms of service. Upon termination, your certifications will be deactivated.

changes.title: 8. Changes to Terms of Service
changes.description: We reserve the right to change these terms of service at any time. We will inform you of significant changes by email. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance.

law.title: 9. Applicable Law
law.description: German law applies. The place of jurisdiction is, to the extent permitted by law, the registered office of the operator.
